Package org.myshelfie.view.GUI

Class LobbyControllerFX

java.lang.Object
org.myshelfie.view.GUI.LobbyControllerFX
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class LobbyControllerFX extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
This class is the controller for the view of a single lobby inside the list of available games shown in the lobby view.

  • Method Details

    • setData

      public void setData(GameController.GameDefinition gameDefinition)
      This method is used to set the data of the lobby. It sets a callback for the join button to send the JoinGameMessage to the server when the button is pressed.
      Parameters:
      gameDefinition - The game definition that contains the data about the game/lobby

    • setClient

      public void setClient(Client client)
      Link this controller to the client that is using it.
      Parameters:
      client - The client that is using this controller
